extent.charseq: this month to allow U.S.-led coalition forces to use Italian air space and military bases _ but not for directs attacks on Iraq

ldc_scope.charseq: The matter immediately sparked controversy in Italy, where there is a strong anti-war movement. The country's parliament voted this month to allow U.S.-led coalition forces to use Italian air space and military bases _ but not for directs attacks on Iraq
